title: Executive Order-Establishment of Yuma Indian Reservation in California
content: Let the lands described in the within letter be set apart as a reservation for the bands of Indians in California therein named, agreeably to the recommendation of the Acting Secretary of the Interior.
citation: Ulysses S. Grant, Executive Order-Establishment of Yuma Indian Reservation in California Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/371199
